name: Left Among Dead in Space
description:
You are the last survivor on a space ship invaded by a mysterious alien life-form that has taken over the dead corpses of fellow spacemen... All your surviving comrades have escaped via escape pods, leaving you behind.  The only hope is to fight the aliens head on...

Controls:

  • WASD for movement.
  • Numpad 4 and 6 to aim. 
  • Numpad 5 to shoot.
  • Numpad 8 to reload.

This game was submitted to the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3:

NOKIA 3310 JAM 3

This is also my first game jam ever! Had loads of fun.

Made using Godot Engine.
